channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server 2008 R2 Setup starts and then disappears
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Mohammad Saiful Islam
item.dc:creator: Mohammad Saiful Islam
item.description: Thank you Ted Krueger. After removing “Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 Setup Support Files” from Programs and Features in Control Panel it worked.
item.content:encoded: Thank you Ted Krueger. After removing “Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 Setup Support Files” from Programs and Features in Control Panel it worked.

item.title: By: loke
item.dc:creator: loke
item.description: I cant find any SQL 2012 Setup files at my ARP. Please help! Urgent. Thanks
item.content:encoded: I cant find any SQL 2012 Setup files at my ARP. Please help! Urgent. Thanks

item.title: By: Thiyagu
item.dc:creator: Thiyagu
item.description: i need sql server 2008 r2 support file of database mail installation. how to i installed
item.content:encoded: i need sql server 2008 r2 support file of database mail installation. how to i installed

item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
That was it, thankyou.
Javier it's in Add/Remove Programs.
item.content:encoded:
That was it, thankyou.

Javier it’s in Add/Remove Programs.

item.title: By: Javier
item.dc:creator: Javier
item.description: Where must I find “Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Setup Support Files” ?<br /> I can´t find any folder with that name.
item.content:encoded:
Where must I find “Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Setup Support Files” ?
I can´t find any folder with that name.

item.title: By: Mike in Los Angeles
item.dc:creator: Mike in Los Angeles
item.content:encoded:
WOW!! I had this same problem with installing the new SQL Server 2012 Express with tools and it was driving me crazy!!! Starts to install and then nada.. nothing…. .just sits there… No warning… So, I just went into the ARP and removed the SQL 2012 Setup files and ran the whole thing again and it worked!! Much thanks for the tip!!!

Mike in Los Anglees, Calif

item.title: By: Glenn B
item.dc:creator: Glenn B
item.description: Yes matey; this was exactly what happened to me as well!!
item.content:encoded: Yes matey; this was exactly what happened to me as well!!
